content: Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw is an optional Yaoguai Chief miniboss that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. As an optional foe, you can seek out this boss near the entrance to Sandgate Village to help assist a friendly Xu Dog with a quest.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw.md', within the main section titled 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw'.
The content is as follows:
Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw is an optional Yaoguai Chief miniboss that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. As an optional foe, you can seek out this boss near the entrance to Sandgate Village to help assist a friendly Xu Dog with a quest.
